error.message:
One or more validation errors were detected during model generation:
Quick.Framework.EFData.PROD_GROUP_ITEM_Group: : Multiplicity conflicts with the referential constraint in Role 'PROD_GROUP_ITEM_Group_Target' in relationship 'PROD_GROUP_ITEM_Group'. Because all of the properties in the Dependent Role are non-nullable, multiplicity of the Principal Role must be '1'. PROD_GROUP_ITEM_Group_Source: : Multiplicity is not valid in Role 'PROD_GROUP_ITEM_Group_Source' in relationship 'PROD_GROUP_ITEM_Group'. Because the Dependent Role refers to the key properties, the upper bound of the multiplicity of the Dependent Role must be '1'.
error.detail:
System.Data.Entity.ModelConfiguration.ModelValidationException: One or more validation errors were detected during model generation:
Quick.Framework.EFData.PROD_GROUP_ITEM_Group: : Multiplicity conflicts with the referential constraint in Role 'PROD_GROUP_ITEM_Group_Target' in relationship 'PROD_GROUP_ITEM_Group'. Because all of the properties in the Dependent Role are non-nullable, multiplicity of the Principal Role must be '1'. PROD_GROUP_ITEM_Group_Source: : Multiplicity is not valid in Role 'PROD_GROUP_ITEM_Group_Source' in relationship 'PROD_GROUP_ITEM_Group'. Because the Dependent Role refers to the key properties, the upper bound of the multiplicity of the Dependent Role must be '1'.
